lines.text:
[sings]
I chopped the chicken, but I didn't chop the broccoli.

[he has just taken down the two exterminators and is chanting his name in victory]
Hiro! Hiro! Hiro! Hiro! Hiro!

[stops for a second, then continues]
Hiro! Hiro! Hiro! Hiro!

[he has spotted a small, brown thing on the floor]
Hey! Is that a weasel dropping?

[he eats it]
Hey, it's a raisin!
